thread.title: Jessica Michael
thread.title_full: Giant Vintage Sunglasses reviewed by Jessica Michael

author: Jessica Michael
title: Jessica Michael
text: It shipped to Canada and arrived about 3-4 weeks after I ordered. When I opened up the box I found the Divine white/SD glasses to be not so white after all. It was more of an off white colour or cream colour. Other than that, I'm pleased with my new Glasses.
